backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented UI features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their responsibilities and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variants, and base UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the profile UI, share button, phone/email/Instagram actions, and validated link list.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Toast notification system with global listeners and auto-removal behavior.
frontend/src/features/profile/profileTyp: Type definitions for profile data and the default profile with Snapchat and Instagram links.
frontend/src/features/profile/useProfile: Hook that loads, migrates, updates, and sanitizes profile data in localStorage, including Instagram/email/Snapchat migrations.
frontend/src/features/profile/validation: Validation helpers for URLs, phone numbers, email addresses, and safe mailto link generation.
frontend/src/features/share/useCopyToCli: React hook for copying text to the clipboard with modern and fallback methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that all data lives in localStorage and no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom OKLCH color variables and utility animations for a gold-and-black themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind themes, colors, animations, and plugins using CSS variables for consistent styling.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements, existing features, issues, and design notes for the Linktree-style landing page.
